objects.text:
Advanced X-Trans CMOS II sensor • Electronic viewfinder
Fast autofocus system • Built-in Wi-Fi • Tiltable LCD screen
Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel photography

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera design
• Advanced X-Trans CMOS II sensor for exceptional image quality
• Versatile interchangeable lens system with X-mount
• Premium build quality with durable metal construction
• Multiple manual control dials for precise settings adjustment
• Electronic viewfinder for accurate composition
• Tiltable LCD screen for creative angle shooting
• Fast autofocus system for capturing decisive moments
• Built-in Wi-Fi for easy photo sharing and remote control
• Compatible with Fujifilm's renowned X-series lenses
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel photography
• Advanced film simulation modes for creative expression

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and high-contrast layout ideal for electronics or camera promotions. The composition is centered, with a bold title layer (`heading`) at the top in white, followed by a sleek subheading (`tagline`) in a bright orange hue. The central product image (`product_image`) is positioned against a dark radial and grid-patterned background, creating a focal point. Informational text (`description`) is neatly presented below the product with key features in a light gray. The orange pricing text (`price`) is attention-grabbing, situated just above a vibrant orange call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with white text (`cta`). The use of circular target lines adds depth and visual focus.

**Color Palette:**
- Charcoal Black: `#1A1A1A` (background)
- Bright Orange: `#FF5722` (accents, CTA, tagline, price)
- Pure White: `#FFFFFF` (title, CTA text)
- Light Gray: `#E0E0E0` (description)
product_color: The product image features the Fujifilm X-T10 camera, predominantly colored in matte and glossy black (#000000, #1A1A1A), giving a sleek and professional look. The white logos and markings (#FFFFFF) contrast sharply against the dark body, enhancing brand visibility and functionality. Metallic accents like the lens ring and dials add subtle shading and texture with tones like gunmetal gray (#2F2F2F) and steel silver (#B0B0B0). Lens highlights show tints of light green (#A4C8A0) and soft amber (#D9A441), blending naturally in the glass reflection to draw focus. A banner can use monochromatic contrast with bold whites and soft metallics for a modern, clean aesthetic.
